resources.string:
You are about to set up &appname;.

This app depends on the Work Profile feature of Android to hide the existence of apps. 

If you choose to continue, &appname; will set up a Work Profile for you. Within this profile, you will be able to run your privacy sensitive apps.

To end lockdown and recover access to this app, you have to:
1. Turn your work profile off and on again.
2. Wait a couple of seconds, until an invisible, secret lockscreen overlay is created.
3. Enter your secret pattern.
Tap and hold to trigger lockdown or wipe.
